about_the_game:
The Earth has been ravaged by a devastating invasion by an alien race named the Vulkil.

Your story begins in the year 2172 as an unidentified Specialist on Olympia Prime, a base located on Earth's moon.
You've just been volunteered to participate in a secret military experimental procedure called ZOA Protocol.
Little is known about ZOA Protocol except that most who undergo it don't survive.
Those who survive experience enhanced abilities such as strength, endurance, speed and dexterity.
As a ZOA Protocol survivor you must use your newly discovered powers to race against time to defeat the Vulkil, ultimately saving Earth.
The game story will unfold chapter by chapter and saving Earth will require you to commandeer space craft, locate and fly to Alien planets & forge or break alliances in the search for a way to defeat the Vulkil.

In this Demo you can play through the first 5 chapters of the pre-alpha version of ZOA Protocol. You will be able to explore your base and launch expiditions to other planets but won't be able to progress the campaign any further forward. We hope you enjoy our little glimpse in to the world of ZOA Protocol

content_descriptors.notes: The game features intense gunfight sequences. The protagonist is human, fighting a humanoid alien species with accompanying creatures.

The Earth has been ravaged by a devastating invasion by an alien race named the Vulkil.

Your story begins in the year 2172 as an unidentified Specialist on Olympia Prime, a base located on Earth's moon.
You've just been volunteered to participate in a secret military experimental procedure called ZOA Protocol.
Little is known about ZOA Protocol except that most who undergo it don't survive.
Those who survive experience enhanced abilities such as strength, endurance, speed and dexterity.
As a ZOA Protocol survivor you must use your newly discovered powers to race against time to defeat the Vulkil, ultimately saving Earth.
The game story will unfold chapter by chapter and saving Earth will require you to commandeer space craft, locate and fly to Alien planets & forge or break alliances in the search for a way to defeat the Vulkil.

In this Demo you can play through the first 5 chapters of the pre-alpha version of ZOA Protocol. name: ZOA Protocol Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 55 GB available space

short_description: A Third Person Sci Fi Action/Survival RPG, ZOA Protocol casts the player in the role of Subject ZOA398 who must battle an overwhelming Alien Invasion in order to return Earth to the control of Humanity, all while managing inventory, character skills & crafting more powerful equipment and armor.
